plot: The story of 8-year-old Annabelle, a child-beauty-queen who is pushed to the edge and must take drastic measures to reclaim her childhood.
title: Beauty Mark
plot_es: The story of 8-year-old Annabelle, a child-beauty-queen who is pushed to the edge and must take drastic measures to reclaim her childhood.
